alert.note: Alert for Calhoun; Coastal Bay; Coastal Franklin; Coastal Gulf; Inland Bay; Inland Franklin; Inland Gulf; Liberty; Washington (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 09 at 2:49PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Gulf, Bay and Calhoun Counties in the Panhandle of Florida, Liberty County in Big Bend of Florida, southeastern Washington County in the Panhandle of Florida and Franklin Counties in Big Bend of Florida through 345 PM EDT/245 PM CDT/... At 249 PM EDT/149 PM CDT/, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 8 miles northwest of Lynn Haven to 7 miles west of Wewahitchka to 11 miles southeast of Port St. Joe. Movement was east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Panama City, Lynn Haven, Panama City Beach, Callaway, Blountstown, Port St. Joe, Apalachicola, Springfield, Mexico Beach, Hiland Park, Stonemill Creek, Tyndall Air Force Base, Orange, Parker, Wewahitchka, Bristol, Altha, Honeyville, Jewel Fire Tower and Clarksville. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Calhoun; Coastal Bay; Coastal Franklin; Coastal Gulf; Inland Bay; Inland Franklin; Inland Gulf; Liberty; Washington
